description: Combining the best of the classic eton mess and peach melba, this easy-to-make meringue recipe with poached peach and raspberries is a delicious sweet treat.
name: Poached Peach Melba Mess Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Halve and destone peaches, then chop into large pieces. Divide creme fraiche mixture and peach among plates. Top with raspberries and meringue. Drizzle over syrup and scatter over pistachios, then serve.
